dc.title: Federal Mentoring Council
dc.description: Spearheaded by the Corporation for National and Community Service, the Federal Mentoring Council, comprised of representatives from a host of federal government agencies, was established to secure more successful futures for our nationâ€™s youth aimed at closing the mentoring gap and creating new mentoring opportunities by leveraging the expertise, resources, and influence of government agencies.
